original_title: 完全主観で楽しむ紺野ひかるとの新婚生活
overview: A video where you become the main character and enjoy your newlywed life with Hikaru Konno! I'm Hikaru. I just got married last month and I'm a newlywed. My husband is older and very kind and always wraps me around. But if there is only one dissatisfaction, my husband is too naughty ... Please experience our married life!
title: Enjoy The Newly Wed Lifestyle With Hikaru Konno Entirely In POV
